__set_project()
#set(__OUTPUT_NAME glew32)
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY __PROJECT_SPIRV_CROSS_NAME ${PROJECT_NAME})
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY __PROJECT_SPIRV_CROSS_INCLUDE ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/install/include)
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY __PROJECT_SPIRV_CROSS_CORE_SLIB ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/install/lib/spirv-cross-core$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:d>${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_SUFFIX})
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY __PROJECT_SPIRV_CROSS_GLSL_SLIB ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/install/lib/spirv-cross-glsl$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:d>${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_SUFFIX})
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY __PROJECT_SPIRV_CROSS_MSL_SLIB ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/install/lib/spirv-cross-msl$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:d>${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_SUFFIX})

include(ExternalProject)

ExternalProject_Add(
    ${PROJECT_NAME}
    PREFIX ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
    GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/KhronosGroup/SPIRV-Cross.git
    GIT_TAG 2020-01-16
    GIT_SHALLOW 1
    GIT_PROGRESS 1
    TMP_DIR tmp
    STAMP_DIR stamp
    DOWNLOAD_DIR download
    INSTALL_DIR install
    SOURCE_DIR src
    BINARY_DIR ${__BUILD_DIR}
    UPDATE_COMMAND ""
    CMAKE_ARGS
        -DSPIRV_CROSS_ENABLE_TESTS=OFF
        -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=<INSTALL_DIR>
)

set_property(TARGET ${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTY FOLDER ${__AE_EXTERNAL_FOLDER_NAME})
